summary: This is a letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, transmitting witness materials, Government Exhibits, and discovery to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell for her upcoming trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the inmate at the Metropolitan Detention Center to whom the U.S. Attorney's Office is sending witness materials, Government Exhibits, and discovery for her criminal case.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York sent discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell in jail on October 29, 2021.
The materials included witness materials and Government Exhibits for her criminal case (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
Ghislaine Maxwell was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn under inmate number 02879-509.
